overview: After the untimely death of Kathy's (Kirsten Price) husband Sean (Eric Masterson), strange things begin to happen. Kathy is repeatedly haunted by unexplained sounds, lights flicker without reason and photographs crash to the floor. When the apparitions appear in her bedroom, she's had enough. Determined to get her life back, Kathy seeks the help of experts to remove the evil spirits. But just who are they? And why are they there? Before he died Sean told Kathy he'd love and protect her forever. Sometimes it takes the power of love to fight the supernatural. But will love be enough?
title: Supernatural
